Recent updates in the Stitch Fix app:
Includes all recent updates that make your experience even more seamless plus new and improved features.

- Self-Service Extensions for those of you who need a bit more time to check out and return your Fix
- Ability to request a return extension right from the app without contacting customer service
- Updated enhancements to security
- Fixed minor bugs that may have been bugging you

Recent updates in the Stitch Fix app:
Includes all recent updates that make your experience even more seamless plus new and improved features.

- Self-Service Extensions for those of you who need a bit more time to check out and return your Fix
- Ability to request a return extension right from the app without contacting customer service
- Updated enhancements to security
- Fixed minor bugs that may have been bugging you

Our app is now ready for iOS 11 and will play nicely with your iPhone X! Don't forget, you can earn $25 by sharing the convenience of Stitch Fix with your friends! Just tap the Referrals button to get started.
